subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Jim Fassel, who took the Giants to the Super Bowl in the 2000 season, is the president, general manager and head coach of the Las Vegas Locomotives in the United Football League.
snippet: Jim Fassel, who took the Giants to the Super Bowl in the 2000 season, is the president, general manager and head coach of the Las Vegas Locomotives in the United Football League.
